review:
My 1st delivery I got it done with Dr Sreeja Rani ma'am, I got  a  complications on delivery time     2 loop rounded for my baby, she having patience and  motivated  me  supported lot and did normal delivery, 
Day 1 I was consulting with her  strongly I can recommend her  Thanks to kinder hospital  for getting very good doctor for the patients..
Coming to the nurses  in the labour room I got very support from  shiny sister and vinodhini sister 
Thank you so much

Dr Sreeja is extremely patient and pleasant to talk to, I am consulting her for my second pregnancy *** * **** *** ********* ************* *** she has been guiding me well, she is available for urgent issues *** ******* ***** *** ************* **** ********* ** ****** and keeps my anxiety in control.

About a month ago, we went to consult Doctor 1 (Not disclosing) to get diagnosed. Unfortunately, Dr. 1 *** ****** ** ********** *** ********* ** ** refer Doctor 2 in the same hospital. For this suggestion and consultation, THIS hospital charged us 700/- and further asked us to pay another 700/- for consulting Doctor 2. Their justification was and quoted "Doctor's prescription is *consult another Doctor*". What kind of medical prescription was that? 
Keep changing the doctor and keep charging the money.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had a terrible experience with her. She didn’t bother to speak anything. I had to keep asking her what to do next .. really disappointed.. I drove all the way for 12 kms in hot sun and in 2 minutes she sends me out .. I will never ever consult her again .. she didn’t bother to tell me the solution .. I had to keep probing her .. felt terrible
The doctor was friendly and helpful. She didn't give any false hope and the way she put accorss the truth is really good which is helpful for patients to make the right decision.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I wanted to share my experience with Dr. Sreeja who recently assisted me with my delivery. Although I had no prior personal experience with her, I decided to consult Dr. Sreeja based on the positive online reviews and informative YouTube videos she had posted. 

From the moment I spoke with Dr. Sreeja, my skepticism began to fade away. She immediately put me at ease and instilled confidence that I was in safe hands. My delivery was in the early morning hours, and I was impressed to see that Dr. Sreeja was there with me even during off-hours alongside her team, ensuring that every aspect of the delivery went smoothly.

She never recommended any unnecessary tests, scans, or medications. Additionally, she was open to considering our opinions and preferences, which made the entire process more comfortable and personalized.

Based on my personal experience, I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Sreeja Rani to anyone in need of a skilled and compassionate gynecologist. 

Thank you, Dr. Sreeja, for your exceptional care and for making my delivery experience a positive and memorable one.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
I am happy that i got my delivery done my dr. Sreeja. She extremely calm and good at her work. My son is now 2yrs. Healthy and happy. Thks a ton.
Mine was a c section delivery but i had no major problems and issues related to health now even then. Medication suggested by her is minimum and required. Thats the best part.

context: Labor and Delivery,Pregnancy,Pregnant,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Pregnancy Check Up,
review: * ***** *** ***** *** ** *** **** ************ ******* Mine was a high risk pregnancy with lot of complications from gdm, hypothyroidism to preeclampsia. But with her constant guidance, support and careful monitoring I was able to deliver a healthy baby at 37weeks and that too through normal delivery. Really grateful to her!

The doctor was pushing for C section *** *** *** **** *** *** ****** ********* After delivery, her nursing assistants made us sign a medical history ***** *** **** **** * ***** ********* ****** It was shown that C section was done as last resort, life saving measure ******* *** * ******* *** **** ******* **** ** ******* **** *** **** ******* ** **** Also, When i asked for a copy of the medical history, the medical staff refused to share with me. **** *** **** * **** *** ******* ** ******* ******* *** ******* **** *** ****** ** ********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Post Pregnancy Classes,
review: Doctor didn't even bother to listen to patient , she is not even ready to provide any tablet in the prescription. Because I have already delivered a baby, she didn't even bother to talk and listen to me as if she treating patients with free of cost. Felt like she just want to finish the discussion and send out.\n\nI strongly recommend not to go to this doctor. Patients visit to doctors because they trust them so that they can feel better and doubts get clarified, not just to spend money on them and get no answer for our queries.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: * **** ***** **** * ****** **** **** *** *********** I recently went to manipal to get check ups ... because of my irregular periods and other problems... the doctor was rude and was like you are fat and its all because of eating too much ...how does she even know what I ate ... just by looking at me she decided I have  thyroid and Pcos.. without even listening my symptoms or anything !! She suggested me to get some tests !! **** **** ** ****** doesn't even care to listen to the patients symptoms ? After I got the tests done ... it was noted that I had some fibroids on my uterus ... I questioned her if it is serious ...as I had no clue what it is...she didn't even care to reply for it and gave prescription for medicines ! I'll suggest not to see the doctor... As a doctor with experience she is supposed to explain the patients what the problem is********** ******* *** ********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We went for early menstruation problem (of course first time occurance) , doctor reffered some n number of tests (5k cost) without even some detail diagnosis of history for probable cause finding. I am okay with that as the bigger the net chances are more to catch the fish(root cause) . But even after these tests reports, the doctor couldn't give me a proper root cause, just answered may be because of stress, can you believe it. And also I observed, doctor is not interested at all to go deep into the matter. When my wife asks for another problem, the doctor without examination only, concluded not issue (how is that possible, I wonder). I have the complete story, as we had very good experience with her first appointment when she was in Narayana hospital, so we thought of consulting with her again (now she is in manipal). With current experience, definitely I wouldn't refer anyone to her. Now I have to look for someone better.

*** ** *** **** ************** * *** *** she took my case of twin pregnancy very calmly. Whenvever required i was able to get in touch with her over phone. She listens to problems patiently and wont rush just to wrap up things like other doctors do as i have been to other best doctors of the city for my check ups.
We have been consulting from last 8 years  Dr. Shreeja Rani is very good and give genuine suggestions and good advice for health. Very good in nature.
Doctor is very polite and very sweet. I definitely recommend her. She listens to all the complaints carefully and patiently.
Visited doctor for pregnancy and she delivered my son  .Had very good experience with her and  hospital everything went smoothly..

****** ** **** ***** *** gives a lot of confidence. Will not simply give medicines. I had bp problems she asked me to take exercise and maintain which is very much working for me now. I recommend dr Sreeja rani

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She has wonderful temperament.She always push us to be a normal delivery even if sometimes we have even asked for c section.I will recommend every one to consult Dr Sreeja Rani.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She is very supportive and have patience to listen the problem. Very good doctor. Because of her advise I was able to do normal delivery in 38 week also, though I was gestational patient. This feed back is also a thank u note to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: ********* ******* I am very happy with her treatment. Highly recommended. She is very supportive throughout the pregnancy. She explained everything in detail.

Hi , She is a friendly doctor . She doesn't give negative comments or scare the mom-to-be . She was also positive and affirmative . She came down very quick to the delivery room and delivered in a hour's time. She delivered our baby with utmost care.

Went to doctor since i was having occasional chills as well as lower abdomen pain . She put me on an antibiotic course. Once the course was completed the fever again recurred only to discover i had thyphoid. The preliminary assessment was not at all done properly by the doctor.

Also the reports of each and every test have to be specifically asked. They don't share unless you ask them

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ** ********* *** ***** ********* She bluntly told in this situation baby can die and refer some doctor ***** *** ***** *** *********** Then I changed the doctor and pregnancy done ******* *** ************* Never go to her, she will sound sweet *** **** ***** ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: **** ********* *** **** **** ********* * Sreeja Ma'm has been very supportive . She listens to all our queries with patience and gives best advises. she motivated us towards healthy practices and delivered our baby naturally. Will be grateful to her forever.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

review: Am highly disappointed,she doesn't explain anything after any of the scans or blood tests.When i was worried and asked,her only reply would be "normal".Same ways when asked about my abnormal vomiting,change in nail colour, her reply would be "its normal". It would be satisfying if a doctor explains us what is the scan for and what is the result with some interest as its the only big thing for a mom-to-be right now.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Medical Termination Of Pregnancy (Mtp),Medical Termination Of Pregnancy (Mtp),
review: ** ***** ** ***** *** **** ****** **** * ***** ** *** **** *********** Motivates the patients. Will help in giving the complete details of the treatment before it starts.. She takes care of her patients very well.. Very soft spoken..Extends her timings and Stays late until patient recovers and fine.. A great experience.. Suggests on a note of 100% to everyone to consult doctor for any of the gynecology issues..
She seems to be good. I had good reviews about her from one of my friend. But when  I visited her, she seems in hurry and not interested in solving your queries.
We are move the scan checking; in there it will be take more then one and half hours. So after the scan checking we can't discuss and meet the doctor. So please arrange today itself. ....

Very friendly , calm, composed and explained the issue clearly.
Precribed for a scanning and later observed the report and explained there is no issue
